description: This file defines an interface ILocalStore within the WPEFramework::Plugin namespace, outlining methods for managing a local storage component such as opening storage, creating tables, setting limits, and managing entries.

classes.name: ILocalStore
classes.description: An interface class specifying methods for local storage operations such as opening storage, creating tables, setting limits, and managing entries.

methods.name: Open
methods.description: Open the local storage at the specified path.

methods.name: CreateTable
methods.description: Create a new table in the local storage.

methods.name: SetLimit
methods.description: Set a limit on the number of entries in a specific table.

methods.name: GetEntriesCount
methods.description: Retrieve the number of entries in a table within a specified range.

methods.name: GetEntries
methods.description: Get a list of entries from a table starting from a specific position.

methods.name: RemoveEntries
methods.description: Remove entries within a specified range from a table.

methods.name: AddEntry
methods.description: Add an entry to a specified table.
